songs.title: Hammer
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Verse]
Don Corleone on the purge, oh
I think I'm running my city, uh
From the block to the [?]
Dirt bike’s pumpin' on curb
Cardi B chopper, okurrr (Bow!)

[Chorus]
Diamonds they heavy, I don't got no diamonds
Fuck on a bitch, I get up in her pants
I had a percocet, don’t fuck with xannies
Kids don't do drugs it'll fuck up your sanity
I love my shootas they always protecting me
Hand on the hammer, it may get the hammering
I got this cash, it take care of my family
Brother don't got to sell hard by the Dollar Tree
Oh, I'm in my zone-
